name: No Mans Land (itch)
description:
This is No Mans Land. It is a simple Horde-based strategy game set in the trenches of the first world war. Fight your way through mud and blood in three unique game modes. Comment if you want linux or .apk files as well as this is only available on windows but does extend to allow mobile controls.

Here is the link to my website, featuring blog and morehttps://sites.google.com/view/halfdecent-games-
